definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation

sentences.english: The cottons are meant to be combined with destructured jackets, felts, or hairy glenchecks.
sentences.chinese: 棉也可以與夾克，毛毯，或毛格子呢結合。

sentences.english: The tartan check also appears on a special tag on the heel.
sentences.chinese: 格子呢檢查在腳跟的一個特別標記也出現。

sentences.english: The Authentic comes with a black canvas upper and a tartan check lining.
sentences.chinese: 地道來與上部一塊黑的帆布和格子呢檢查襯裏。
